Author: Marco Hunsicker
Comment:
A config like:

order += "cpu_temperature 1"
order += "cpu_temperature 2"
order += "cpu_temperature 3"
order += "cpu_temperature 4"

cpu_temperature 1 {
    format = "%degrees째"
    path = "/sys/devices/platform/coretemp.0/temp2_input"
    max_threshold = 70
}
cpu_temperature 2 {
    format = "%degrees째"
    path = "/sys/devices/platform/coretemp.0/temp3_input"
    max_threshold = 70
}
cpu_temperature 3 {
    format = "%degrees째"
    path = "/sys/devices/platform/coretemp.0/temp4_input"
    max_threshold = 70
}
cpu_temperature 4 {
    format = "%degrees째"
    path = "/sys/devices/platform/coretemp.0/temp5_input"
    max_threshold = 70
} 

currently displays 4x the temperature from the first sensor.

With this patch, the temperatures are correctly read from each sensor.
